MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in High Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.37am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigation work required to locate the cause of the fault and make a repair and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.03am on the 8th of January 2021.
